about_the_game:
In this life-sim, you are sent by the adventurer’s guild to run a local infirmary. Explore diverse biomes to gather ingredients, nurture your herbs and concoct remedies to aid your guild. Build relationships with your neighbors and engage in community events. 

Manage your own infirmary: When adventurers come back from missions, they will be going to your infirmary to treat their wounds.  You will need to concoct remedies using various reagents of matching properties.  The more matching properties you have the more potent the remedy.  Adventurers with multiple afflictions will require an efficient use of reagents to treat.  

Build Relationships: Meet your neighbors.  Engage in their stories by completing quests and navigating branching narratives.  As you learn more about them you will have opportunities to romance them as well. 

Crop and nurture crops: Tend to your crops that you use for your herbalism.  The herbs will have different needs such as watering frequency, type of soil, and soil nutrition.  Your herbs will need to be nurtured to get the most out of them. 

Explore diverse biomes: To acquire herbs with new or different combinations of reagent properties you will need to go out and explore the different biomes.  Each has reagents that can be discovered.  Some are hidden away while others are inaccessible unless you have the proper gear to reach it.
